import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Navbar, MobileNav, Button, IconButton, } from "@material-tailwind/react"; import logo from "../static/images/logo.png"; export default function NavBar() { const [openNav, setOpenNav] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener( "resize", () => window.innerWidth >= 960 && setOpenNav(false) ); }, []); return (
setOpenNav(!openNav)} > {openNav ? ( ) : ( )}
); }
